author: Minyvonne Burke
title: NYC landlord waives April rent for 200 tenants
description: Mario Salerno, a New York City landlord who owns roughly 80 apartments in Brooklyn, told his 200 tenants that they would not have to pay rent for the month of April.
content:
Mario Salerno, a landlord in New York, has forgiven the rent of all 200 tenants in his building for the month of April.NBC New York
